sentences.en: A boisterous horse must have a rough bridle.

sentences.en: He could not have buckled a bridle on his own.
sentences.cn: 他顾不得备自己的马鞍了.

sentences.en: He learned to bridle his temper.

sentences.en: Inadvertently the paper added a comma to the ad, which read instead:Horse, saddle and bridle for $50.

sentences.en: It's not easy to bridle a horse that is not well broken.
